participant_1.background:
The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.
I am a creative person who loves to make my nails look their best.
i am in debt.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
my car is black.

participant_2.background:
I would not be able to be a taxi driver since I can't see.
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
i want to go back to school.

content.text: Hey, I'm happy to make new friends, what's your name?
Nice to meet you too! My name is (name). What's yours?
You too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook and garden, I also like to collect rocks. What about you?
I love to spend time with my kids, especially when we're baking together. I also love to dress up in hunter green.
That's really sweet! I love spending time with my family as well. Green is a very calming color.
It is, I love how it makes me feel. What are some of your favorite dishes to cook?
I love cooking pasta dishes, especially with fresh vegetables. I also love making homemade bread.
Wow, homemade bread sounds delicious! I'm not very good at cooking, but I love to bake.
That's awesome! I love baking too. I'm actually planning on baking some cookies later today.
That sounds amazing! I would love to try some of your cookies if you're willing to share.
Of course! I'd be happy to share some of my cookies with you.
